title: Sen. Elizabeth Warren | Trump Threatens War Crimes Against Iran: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump threatening war crimes against Iran after ordering the assassination of a top Iranian General.

Then, he talks to presidential hopeful Sen. Elizabeth Warren.
